title: Hospitality Practical Competency Enhancement: Instructional Design Based on Math Inquiry Using Graph Software

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can visually analyze changes in function slopes using smartphone-based graphing software (e.g., GeoGebra Mobile)
Instructors can develop teaching materials that promote students' conceptual understanding by designing inquiry-based learning activities
Teachers can collaborate to create formative assessment tools and measure learning effectiveness

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
